remarks: Lemma for ~ alexsubALT .  If a point is covered by a collection taken from the base with no finite subcover, a set from the subbase can be added that covers the point so that the resulting collection has no finite subcover.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Jan-2010.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Dec-2013.)

X = U. n ) $.
